languages.text: {n}Абеляр вздрагивает.{/n} "Этот тон..." {n}Сенешаль пораженно оглядывает вас с головы до ног, однако заметно, что он все еще колеблется.{/n}
{n}Abelard startles.{/n} "That tone..." {n}The Seneschal looks you over from head to toe in amazement, but you can see that he is still unsure.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр вздрагивает.{/n} "Этот тон..." {n}Сенешаль пораженно оглядывает вас с головы до ног, однако заметно, что он все еще колеблется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard startles.{/n} "That tone..." {n}The Seneschal looks you over from head to toe in amazement, but you can see that he is still unsure.{/n}

{n}Abelard startles.{/n} "That tone..." {n}The Seneschal looks you over from head to toe in amazement, but you can see that he is still unsure.{/n}
{n}Abelard startles.{/n} "That tone..." {n}The Seneschal looks you over from head to toe in amazement, but you can see that he is still unsure.{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德吃了一惊。{/n}“这种语气……”{n}他惊讶地把你从头到脚打量了一遍，但你看得出来，他依然不太确信。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard startles.{/n} "That tone..." {n}The Seneschal looks you over from head to toe in amazement, but you can see that he is still unsure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德吃了一惊。{/n}“这种语气……”{n}他惊讶地把你从头到脚打量了一遍，但你看得出来，他依然不太确信。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard da un respingo.{/n} «Ese tono de voz...». {n}El senescal te mira de arriba abajo con expresión de asombro, pero notas que aún no está seguro del todo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard startles.{/n} "That tone..." {n}The Seneschal looks you over from head to toe in amazement, but you can see that he is still unsure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard da un respingo.{/n} «Ese tono de voz...». {n}El senescal te mira de arriba abajo con expresión de asombro, pero notas que aún no está seguro del todo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard irkiliyor.{/n} "Bu ses tonu..." {n}Seneşal seni baştan aşağı hayretle süzüyor. Hâlâ sen olduğundan emin olmadığını görebiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard startles.{/n} "That tone..." {n}The Seneschal looks you over from head to toe in amazement, but you can see that he is still unsure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard irkiliyor.{/n} "Bu ses tonu..." {n}Seneşal seni baştan aşağı hayretle süzüyor. Hâlâ sen olduğundan emin olmadığını görebiliyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはびっくりする。{/n}「そのしゃべり方は…」{n}家令長は、驚いた様子であなたを頭からつま先まで眺めるが、彼がまだ確信していないことが見て取れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard startles.{/n} "That tone..." {n}The Seneschal looks you over from head to toe in amazement, but you can see that he is still unsure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはびっくりする。{/n}「そのしゃべり方は…」{n}家令長は、驚いた様子であなたを頭からつま先まで眺めるが、彼がまだ確信していないことが見て取れる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abélard sursaute.{/n} « Cette intonation... » {n}Le sénéchal vous détaille des pieds à la tête, ébahi, mais vous pouvez voir qu'il hésite encore.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard startles.{/n} "That tone..." {n}The Seneschal looks you over from head to toe in amazement, but you can see that he is still unsure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard sursaute.{/n} « Cette intonation... » {n}Le sénéchal vous détaille des pieds à la tête, ébahi, mais vous pouvez voir qu'il hésite encore.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Dieser Ton ..." {n}Der Truchsess mustert dich ungläubig von Kopf bis Fuß, aber du erkennst, dass er noch immer unsicher ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard startles.{/n} "That tone..." {n}The Seneschal looks you over from head to toe in amazement, but you can see that he is still unsure.{/n}
